111.content: When does she start to dominate Luffy?
111.title: Nami

choices: Luffy agrees to be Nami's subordinte.
Luffy would rather die.
1111.content:
"If there's one thing in this world I really hate, it's pirates! But I love money and tangerines!" yelled Nami.

'This guy's a stupid, worthless pirate. He doesn't seem to have anything worth stealing, but maybe he could still be of use to me.’

"So how about it? Do you want to be my navigator?" asked Luffy, ignoring Nami's outburst.

“I said NO” yelled Nami as she threw a punch at Luffy, knocking him to the ground and causing a bump to appear on his head.

Nami was seething at Luffy until she realized how effective it was. Nami then got a huge smile on her face as she walked towards Luffy. As Luffy was about to try to get off the floor, Nami slammed the heel of her right foot into the middle of Luffy’s back.

“Ouch! What was that for?” demanded Luffy.

“Well, well, well. You may be strong, but you’re weak against me, pirate.”

“I’m not weak! And my name is Luffy” replied Luffy as he was trying to stand up.

“Oh no you don’t” stated Nami as then quickly grabbed the rope on the table right next to her and tied up Luffy.

“Now who’s the weak one, Luffy? I just beat you with no effort at all. How does that make you feel?”

Luffy just stared at her in shock. Nami completely overpowered him; her punch was so strong even though he was made of rubber and then she pinned him to the ground before tying him up. He was completely at her mercy and he could not believe it.

“Now the question remains as to what to do with you, Luffy.” She pulled out a small dagger from her pocket and knelt on the ground so that she could get close to Luffy’s face. Although she had no intentions to kill Luffy and stoop to a pirate’s level, Luffy didn’t need to know that. “I can kill you now or, if you swear to become my pirate thief subordinate, I’ll untie you. Those are your options. Either way, your life as a pirate ends now.”
1111.title: When they first meet.

choices: Luffy starts to massage Nami-san's feet.
Luffy still refuses to massage Nami's feet.
11111.content:
In the short amount of time that Luffy knew Nami, he started to grow scared of her. He hadn’t felt this weak since Ace left home. And yet, as he said the next few words that would seal his fate, it was not because he was afraid of death; he was afraid of Nami.

“I’ll join you, Nami. I’ll give up being a pirate and become a pirate thief” said Luffy.

“Very well” responded Nami with a smirk as she took her dagger and cut the rope to free Luffy. She then sat on a chair and kicked off her shoes in Luffy’s direction, which Luffy was able to dodge in time.

“What was that for, Nami?” asked Luffy, wondering why she took off her shoes and kicked them at him.

“I can tell you’re used to doing whatever you want and being your own boss. But that’s no longer true as I am now your boss. I need to train you to obey my orders, no matter how small, so that whenever our lives are in danger, you’ll obey me in those situations as well. And to start, I order you to rub my feet until I tell you to stop. I want you to familiarize yourself with my feet and feel lucky that you get to have this honor of massaging my feet. But more importantly, I want you to learn that I am indeed your boss. And since I am your boss, you will not call me just Nami anymore. You will either call me Boss or Nami-san. Perhaps in time, you’ll even refer to me as Nami-sama. Now get to it already.”

“Now listen here, Nami, I will not rub –“

Luffy was interrupted as Nami punched him in the face, sending him to the ground, and then put her bare right foot on Luffy’s face. “This is precisely why I am ordering you to do this. And this is just the beginning. I need to break this insubordinate behavior out of you right away. Now get to work on my feet” concluded Nami as she sat back down again with a huge smirk and Luffy confused and scared at how strong Nami’s attacks were against him.
11111.title: Luffy agrees to be Nami's subordinte.

choices: Luffy stands up to Nami.
Luffy continues to rub Nami's feet.
111111.content:
Luffy put his head down and said “Okay, Nami-san. I’ll massage your feet.” Luffy then stepped closer to Nami and then got on his knees as he picked up Nami’s right foot to massage it.

“You see, Luffy? Life won’t be so bad being my underling. Many would kill to be in your situation now, serving a beautiful woman like me. But first…” said Nami as she pressed her foot into Luffy’s face. “I want you to get real close to my feet so that you start to smell like my feet. By smelling like my feet, it will help engrain into your mind that you now live to obey me.”

Luffy’s thoughts were going fast in his mind as he was trying to comprehend the situation he was now in. Apparently being Nami’s subordinate required him to do a lot more things than he thought. But he couldn’t dwell on that as he knew if he displeased Nami, she would be angry and Luffy was starting to be scared of Nami-san when she was angry. Luffy was massaging Nami’s feet while periodically rubbing her feet in his face so as to acquire the smell of her feet.

At one point, Nami leaned down and sniffed Luffy. “You now smell like my right foot. Congratulations.”

Nami’s words of congratulations struck Luffy hard. Not an hour ago, he was a pirate, wanting to be Pirate King. Now he was a pirate thief, a subordinate to Nami, and massaging her feet. Luffy realized the importance of his next words. If he rebelled, then at least Nami might ease up and treat him with respect. If he continued to run her feet after the remark she just made, then there would be no turning back; this would be his new life from now on.
111111.title: Luffy starts to massage Nami's feet.

choices: Nami tells Luffy to stop licking her feet.
Nami lets Luffy continue to lick her feet.
1111112.content:
Luffy looked up at Nami and he got shivers down his back at her evil smile. To Luffy, Nami was scary! Even though he was rubber, her punches hurt very badly. It was because of this fear that he did not rebel.

“Thanks, Nami-san. I hope you are enjoying this massage.”

‘Perfect. Luffy’s will is crumbling. Although he obeys me out of fear, he still has a ways to go before he genuinely enjoys serving me and degrading himself for me. But that will come in time.’

“I suppose for your first time, it wasn’t half bad, but it could use some work, Luffy” responded Nami. In actuality, Nami thought he did a wonderful job, but she needed to make Luffy think he did bad so that he would fear her retaliation.

At those words, Luffy panicked and was trying to think of ways to improve his massage. He then looked closer at Nami’s foot and saw dirt in between her toes and on her foot. Without another thought, Luffy began licking her right foot!

Nami was caught off guard by this action as she was not expecting this at all. “What are you doing, Luffy?! I never gave you permission to lick my feet.”

Luffy shuddered at her yell. “I was trying to improve the massage, Nami-san, and I noticed your feet were dirty. Please forgive me as I was just trying to make you more comfortable” said Luffy as he looked at Nami to see her response.

11112.title: Luffy becomes luggage

choices: Nami continues training Luffy.
Nami has Luffy explore the island so he can get familiar with it.
111121.content:
After about twenty hours of sailing, Nami came upon the deserted island that she had found about a year ago. Since then, it had become the place where she hid all her treasure since she did not trust Arlong to not snoop on her home to locate her treasure. Since it was deserted, she also figured it was a good place to begin Luffy's new training.

After docking her ship, she picked up the Luffy bag and went inside the island to where there was nothing but trees, fruits, grass, and other forest life. However, what was missing was no animal life, save for bugs. She then untied the bag and heard Luffy groan as she also slowly freed Luffy from the ball that she forced his body to become.

Luffy slowly got up and started doing some stretches to get rid of the cramps that he had and then he saw that Nami was looking at him. After he saw that she wasn't attacking him, Luffy asked "Where are we? What are we doing here?"

"We're on a deserted island so I can train you to help me steal from pirates."

"Can we eat first? I haven't eaten since you fed me at that house."

"Fine" sighed Nami. She looked around and said "You see that tree over there with apples on it? Get as many as you can using your rubber powers. This can also serve as your first lesson?"

"Why that? I was thinking more like meat. Meat is my favorite food."

'Did he just really tell me what his favorite food was so easily?' thought Nami as she pulled out her bo staff. "Well, unfortunately for you, there are only bugs on this island, no animals. So you'll have to get by without meat while we're here. And now that I know that meat is your favorite food, I'll deny you meat ehenever you disobey me. And that right there has earned you no meat for one week after we have left here. Now get to it!" finished Nami as she wacked him in the head with her staff, sending Luffy to the ground.

After a minute, Luffy got off the ground with a bump on his head. He looked at Nami in fear because of how strong her attacks were on him, and yelled out "Gomu Gomu no Rocket!" as he launched himself at the tree that was far away and after grabbing a dozen, launched himself back. When he did, Nami once again whacked him on the head.

"Just as I thought. You're too loud when using your powers. While what you did was impressive, if there were pirates around and you were stealing their treasure, they'd know where you were immediately. Next time, do it quietly."

"But what about when I'm fighting?" asked Luffy.

"Perhaps that is fine, but the primary objection is to steal from pirates without having to fight needless fights. Sometimes, it is inevitable, but it's about being smart. You may have defeated entire crews by yourself, but there are many, many more that would defeat you if you were to fight them all by yourself." In her mind, the Arlong Pirates came to mind. "This training is to get you accustomed to my style of stealing from pirates. Otherwise, your recklessness will just get us killed."

Nami then dug into an apple and started eating with Luffy following suit. While Luffy didn't really agree with what Nami was saying since he preferred to fight his enemies head on, but he was too afraid of her to say anything back.

1111212.title: Luffy can't read maps

11112121.content:
"All hail the Pirate King, the pirate who can't even read a simple map" said Nami in a mocking voice as she came upon Luffy right beside the boat.

Luffy froze as he heard Nami's voice and he turned his head slowly to look at Nami in fear. He was afraid of what her punishment would be.

Nami walked slowly towards Luffy giving the impression of a hunter cornering their prey. "Please, Nami, forgive me" begged Luffy. Nami didn't say a word as she got up close to Luffy and punched hard, sending him to the ground. As Luffy was groaning on the ground, Nami walked up to him and placed her foot hard on his back.

"It seems that there is a lot more I have to teach you Luffy before you can leave this island." Nami then pulled out some rope and and made something similar to a girdle. She bent down to so that a piece of the rope was in front of Luffy's mouth and told him to "Get on all fours and bite on the rope." As Luffy did so, Nami then grabbed on the other part of the rope and climbed on Luffy's back and rode him like a horse. Nami then began leading Luffy around the island the hard way as she would kick him in the ribs whenever he started to travel in a direction that she didn't order him.

"You know, Luffy, you make an excellent horse" said Nami after an hour. "You'll know the island by the back of your hand in no time at this rate. Now take a left here."

And soon enough, Nami and Luffy were back at the spot that they were at many hours before. While Luffy was feeling very exhausted and sad about his life, Nami was enjoying herself and she liked the ever-growing power she was having over Luffy.

11112121212.title: Luffy makes the perfect thief's tool

choices: Nami wants to test her new tool out more on the island.

111121212122.content:
"Yes, I've decided that you shall become my tool, Luffy" said Nami as she nodded her head. "Your inability to read a simple map yesterday shows me how I would need to teach you to become my assistant. And best of all, since you'll be my tool, I won't have to split my treasure with you! It'll be all mine!" said Nami as her eyes turned into beli symbols momentarily. "Besides, you'd probably blow all your money on something stupid anyway."

Luffy wanted to protest to Nami about being a "tool" but ever since he met Nami, he has only felt trapped and weak. Even now, he couldn't break free from his current position even if he wanted to. He couldn't muster up the strength to say anything and his silence was all that Nami needed to stick with her decision.

As the storm continued on, Nami pulled out some maps to plan their next move. They needed supplies and a better ship wouldn't hurt either. But, aside from the Grand Line map that she stole from Buggy's crew, she hadn't gained any treasure and she was getting close to her goal of 100 million beli to free her home village, so she didn't want to spend too much. She was lost in her plans that she hadn't realized it when the storm ended.

"Nami! Nami! The storm has passed" yelled Luffy to get her attention after failing in a normal voice.

"Already? Wow, time sure flew, huh?"

Nami then released Luffy from his trapped position at the entrance of the cave which caused Luffy to fall to the ground in exhaustion.

Nami decided to resume Luffy's training before she went after the treasure. She had Luffy take her to the bottom of a huge cliff. Nami then took out a bag and filled it with rocks and then put it on her back.

"For the next part of your training, I want you to take me and this bag of rocks up to the top without a single rock falling out. Got that?"

"Yes, Nami" replied Luffy. He then used arm to wrap Nami close beside him and then used the other hand to stretch to the very top and send them flying to the top. Unfortunately, he went so fast that half the bag of rocks fell out.

It took Luffy two hours, but he finally got Nami up the cliff with all her rocks. At the end, Luffy was panting on the ground in exhaustion.

11112121212211221122.content:
"Now Luffy, it is time for some stealth training" said Nami.

"What do you mean by that?" asked Luffy.

"It means being secret. In my case, it means stealing from pirates so that they don't notice me while I'm doing it. In your case, it'll be so that the enemy doesn't know where you are. There will be times where I'll have you hide somewhere with some treasure or maps while I steal some more. Your objective is to take this bag of rocks and hide. Since it'll be sundown in about an hour, you have until sundown as a head start. After that, I'll use my skills as a pirate thief to try to find you and steal stealthily."

"As I'm searching, you are free to move around if you think you can do it without me catching you and subsequently stealing from you. If you can make it to sunrise, you win. If not, I'll not just take back the rocks but I'll also steal something from yours. This time, I'll aim for your straw hat; it looks like it can provide some nice shade."

"Not my straw hat! That's my treasure" protested Luffy.

"Well then Luffy, you better protect your treasure well. Your head start is shrinking, Luffy. Good luck."

Nami watched Luffy run in a panic until he was out of sight and she sat down beside a tree waiting for sundown. About an hour later, sundown came and she began stalking Luffy to steal the bag of rocks and Luffy's greatest treasure.

Nami was really furious at what she just heard Luffy say. He gave ALL the trasure that King Neptune said that they could have to Big Mom's crew members even though he picked a fight with her over control of Fishman Island.

"What?! Nami, you can't do that, I-" started Luffy before Nami punched him in the face.

"Well Luffy, we are going back to the crew and you are going to tell them about the change."

"What? Oh please Nami, I mean Captain Nami, can't we keep this between us for now? It's embarrassing."

"Everyone, for the next week, starting now, I will not be the Captain of our crew." At this point, Luffy gulped before continuing. "Captain Nami will be the Captain temporarily."

To say everyone was shocked would have been an understatement. They leave for a few moments and Luffy says something like this?

“Wow, Nami. I really don’t know what to say about this”, said Usopp. “But maybe after what Luffy just did to Big Mom, this won’t be so bad. You are more level headed than Luffy after all.” Chopper, Brook, and Franky nodded their heads in agreement.

“When I joined the crew, it was to follow Luffy” said Zoro. “But I guess if Luffy allowed you to take over command of the crew, even temporary, then I wonder if he’s fit to be the Captain anyway. Depending on how you lead the crew will determine how much longer I remain in the crew.”

“Fair enough, Zoro. But I do hope you stay with the crew, regardless of who is Captain. I don’t want anyone leaving the crew again” responded Nami.

“I will follow your every command, Captain Nami-swan” yelled Sanji with hearts it his eyes.

“This is certainly interesting news, Nami. I wonder just how much the crew will change over this week” said Robin.

“Yes, I understand this shocks you all, but I promise I will do my best to be the Captain that we all should have had from Luffy from the beginning.”

The crew nodded in understanding of what Nami meant in the ways that Luffy didn’t act like a Captain most of the time. But they were all willing to give this a try and see how Nami would do as Captain.

“Hey wait a minute. Why don’t they have to call you “Captain”? Why am I the only who has to, Nami?” demanded Luffy.

“Because Luffy, this is your punishment, not theirs. And you did not respond to me the way you are supposed to Luffy. Perhaps you need a more physical reminder to remind yourself of the situation you are in.” Nami grabbed his left elbow and stared at his shoulder. “Yes, I know just what to do to you so that you don’t forget who’s in charge” finished Nami with a huge grin.

“If you’ll excuse us everyone, Luffy and I need some time together alone on the ship. We’ll see you later. And before I forget, I have decided that we will stay on Fishman Island for 2 more days so that we can properly rest a bit before heading to the New World. Bye!” yelled Nami as she was dragging Luffy by the elbow.
11131121.title: Nami has Luffy return to the crew and tell them...

111311211.content:
As Nami and Luffy were headed to the ship, they saw many Fishman Island residents thanking them for saving them. As she was responding to the thanks, she again puzzled over Luffy’s (and Zoro’s for that matter) definition of a hero. Luffy wasted so much time arguing with Jinbe, it was ridiculous. Just listen to Jinbe’s plan of becoming a hero and then kick some ass. But Luffy had to be Luffy and waste time arguing. She’ll have to punish him about that later.

“Thanks for your praises, everyone. But if you’ll excuse us, we have something to do on the ship”, bid Nami farewell after a few minutes of listening to the fishmen and mermen thank her and Luffy. After a while, she made it back to the Thousand Sunny with a huge smile on her face.

“Are you ready for your next punishment, Luffy? I sure am.”

“Please, Captain Nami. Whatever you are going to do, please don’t. I’m sorry” responded Luffy as he was thinking of Nami beating him up again since she was always able to inflict so much damage to him. He wasn’t thinking of a different way that Nami would punish him.

“No way, Luffy. It’s too late for that. The stuff I’ll need is probably in Chopper’s medical room.” Nami then went into the ship and found the medical room. She finally let go of Luffy and pointed to a bed and said “Lie there on your stomach, take off your shirt, and don’t move. It’ll be very bad for you if you make me mess up.”

Luffy had no idea what she was talking about but did as he was told. After a while of Nami gathering some supplies, she turned to Luffy and started walking towards him.

“What are you doing with that stuff, Nami?” asked Luffy.

“I’m giving you a tattoo, Luffy. The exact same tattoo as the one on my left shoulder here and it’ll go on your left shoulder as well. And as a result of this, you need to go back to wearing your old vests so that you proudly showcase your new tattoo.”

“But Nami, for a pirate to take a tattoo of someone’s mark, that means they are swearing loyalty to that person. Just like Arlong had you wear his tattoo and Ace received old man Whitebeard’s tattoo when he joined his crew. For me to wear your tattoo permanently, it means that I swear loyalty to you.”

“I thought I told you Luffy that I intend to have you respect me even after you take over as Captain. Once again, you didn’t properly address me like I told you. And you are swearing loyalty to me, whether I am Captain or not. Now don’t move.”

Luffy stayed still with eyes full of fear as Nami began working on his left shoulder. Luffy was thinking back to Zoro’s words about Luffy perhaps not being fit to be Captain if he was willing to step down, even temporarily. Unbeknownst to Luffy, Nami was also thinking of Zoro’s words and was wondering about becoming the Captain permanently. She honestly had no intentions of becoming the Captain permanently when she first took over or when she thought about giving Luffy her tattoo, but Zoro’s words about questioning Luffy being Captain and Luffy’s words just know about the meaning of Luffy wearing her tattoo started making her think about how events were falling into her place even when she didn’t think about it. After a while, Nami finished with Luffy’s new tattoo.

“There you go, Luffy. Be sure to wear my tattoo with pride and serve me faithfully. Now I want you to thank me for giving you my tattoo, Luffy.”

Luffy stared at his tattoo with eyes of shock as he was thinking of how the crew would react to this change. Would they want Nami to remain as Captain? What about his dream of becoming Pirate King? But he heard Nami’s words clearly and so he responded.

“Thank you, Captain Nami, for giving me your tattoo” said Luffy even though they both knew he didn’t mean it.

1113121.content:
After Nami and Usopp met up with Chopper and she eased Chopper's worries about Robin being kidnapped by informing about the importer crew, Nami decided to separate from them under the guise of locating Luffy. While she was telling the truth, her true intentions were different than what she had said.

Nami had done a lot of thinking over the past two years over Luffy's qualities as a Captain and the more she thought about it, she felt he wasn't suited for the position. Sure he was the most powerful in a fight, but at what cost? His Gears had bad side effects and if he had developed more Gears, what would those side effects be? In her opinion, Luffy was too reckless, both with his body and in his thought process. After all, it's not always the most powerful person that can win a fight and Luffy was a very gullible person and quick to abandon any strategies that were pre-planned. And also, when they were on the ships, she gave more orders to the crew than Luffy anyway.

Then, her greedy side also thought to when he blew money away, such as blowing away the remaining money after the Enies Lobby incident or when he left the money behind after leaving the island where they fought with Buggy the first time. She had a bad feeling that this habit could happen in the future and she wanted to be very rich.

It was for these reasons that Nami had decided to overthrow Luffy as the new Captain of their crew. She knew it would be easy as Luffy was very susceptible to her attacks and thus easy to control him. If the crew was to survive in the New World, they needed a smarter Captain in Nami's opinion and she felt she was suitable for it. She would do her best to avoid trouble to protect the crew and when they did have huge battles, Luffy would still be there to fight and help out.

Her thoughts brought her back to the present as she saw someone with a huge coat and a backpack with two people that looked like bad imitations of Sanji and Zoro. She had her suspicions that this was Luffy and if it was, he was about to walk right into the huge mess with the Marines that would inevitably happen with the impostor crew advertising where they would be. Sighing to herself, she summoned up a thunder cloud to electrocute the 2 fakes. The cries of "Zoro! Sanji!" in the familiar voice of Luffy confirmed her suspicions.

'Typical Luffy. It's this behavior of his that makes him unsuitabe to be Captain anymore.' Nami then replied out, "Those two were fakes, Luffy. Those are not the real Zoro and Sanji-kun."

Luffy turned around and said "Nami!" as he waked over to her with a huge grin. "How have you been? It's been so long. Wait, those 2 were fakes? Those weren't the real Zoro and Sanji?"

"Correct, Luffy. There's a whole crew of them impersonating us, except for Brook. Apart from that, I've been great. I learned a lot these past two years."

"Yeah, I learned a lot these past two years too. So are you heading back to the Thousand Sunny? I'm sure most of the crew is there or on their way there."

"Not yet, Luffy. I want to discuss some things with you first. Between Navigator and Captain" said Nami with a smile as she thought 'future Captain and soon-to-be former Captain' in her mind instead.

"Okay then, Nami. Lead the way", said Luffy, unaware of the changes that were about to take place.

As Nami was walking away with Luffy to her destination, she had the feeling of deja vu from when they first met and she was leading him to Buggy before tying him with rope...

Luffy felt very dejected at the callous way that Nami disregarded his dream. However, he also feared Nami when she was angry and he did not want to fight her. He also remembered the despair and self doubt he felt immediately after being separated from the crew as well as when he woke up after the war. He specifically remembered doubting if he had what it took to become the Pirate King. Hearing Nami of all people doubt his qualities as Captain into place brought those old self-doubts back. 'Nami's right. I failed as Captain two years ago right here and I failed at the war too. Perhaps it would be best if she were the Captain; she's an excellent Navigator and a natural at giving orders on the ship as well.'

"Okay, Nami. I agree to step down as Captain and allow you to be the new Captain."

"Excellent, Luffy" said Nami as she put away her Clima Tact. "I'm glad you see my point of view. Now as my first order as Captain, I'm ordering you to stop referring to me as just Nami. The former Captain has no right to address the person who has replaced him so informally. You need to remember that I am now your superior in rank, Luffy. Therefore, you must refer to me as "Captain", "Captain Nami", or "Nami-sama". Do you understand?"

Luffy solemnly nodded his head as he said "I understand, Captain Nami."

Nami smiled and got a shiver of excitement at the way Luffy addressed her. 'Things are progressing as easily as I thought. Luffy was always afraid of me after all, especially when I was angry.'
111312111.title: Luffy agrees to step down as Captain.

choices: Nami and Luffy head to the Thousand Sunny by themselves.

1113121111.content:
"Come along, Luffy. There's a place we need to go to before we regroup with the rest of my crew", stated Nami, emphasizing the word 'my'.

"Yes, Captain Nami" replied Luffy as he followed Nami. Nami led Luffy to Grove 11 and they walked until she came upon a store that had a sign saying "Irezumi's Tattoo Parlor" out front.

"What are we doing here, Captain Nami?" asked Luffy.

"You'll find out soon, Luffy" said Nami as she entered the store with a huge smile on her face with Luffy following her.

As they walked in, at first they didn't see anyone in there, until they noticed a blond haired woman who appeared to be in her twenties with a t shirt and shorts. Different tattoos could be seen on her arms and legs. "Are you Irezumi-san?" asked Nami.

"I am. And you two must be "Cat Burglar" Nami and "Straw Hat" Luffy. I recognize you from your bounty posters. So the rumors of your deaths is false. What can I do for you?"

"That's correct. We are here to give Luffy a tattoo." At that point, Nami turned slightly and pointed at the tattoo on her left shoulder. "I want you to give him a replica of this tattoo and it to be placed on his left shoulder as well."

"What?! That's why we're here? Please no.." at this Luffy stopped as he saw Nami give him a col glare. "I mean, I'd love to have your tattoo, Captain Nami."

"Captain? I thought Straw Hat was the Captain?" asked Irezumi.

"He used to be but now I am the Captain."

"That's pretty funny. The 400 million pirate who caused a lot of problems for the World Government two years ago has lost his position to one of his crew members."

"Wait. 400 million? My bounty's increased? Alright!"

"And that ignorance is one reason why he's not fitted to be Captain anymore. But enough of this. I'd like to proceed."

"Of course. Follow me into the back." Irezumi then led Nami and Luffy into a back room where she does her tattoos. Once they all got there, Irezumi take off his cardigan and sit on a table as she worked. Luffy did not protest anymore as he and Nami watched Irezumi put Nami's tattoo on his shoulder. After she was finished, she bandaged it up until it was ready to take off.

Luffy then put back on his cardigan as the three left the back room to the front again. "By the way, Luffy, once that bandage goes off, you are to go back to wearing the vests you used to wear, weather permitting of course. I want you to display your tattoo and your loyalty to me with pride. Understand?"

"I understand, Captain Nami."

Nami then paid 3,000 beli (they got a got deal because Irezumi thought t was really funny that the "dangerous" Monkey D. Luffy wasn't even the Captain of his own crew anymore) and Nami and Luffy left the tattoo parlor.

11131211112.content:
As they left, they heard their names being called. "Nami! Luffy! There you guys are." They looked up and saw it was Chopper on a giant bird.

"Hey Chopper," replied Nami. "Is that bird a friend of yours from the past 2 years?"

"Yep. It's quite a story about that island I was sent to. I'll fill you and everyone else in when we leave this place."

"Sounds great. I have a lot to tell everyone else too and I'm sure they do too. Come along, Luffy. It's time to start our journey again."

Luffy was strangely quiet as he got on the bird with Nami. He didn't know how to react around the rest of the crew anymore now that he wasn't the Captain. What would they think? How would they be told? Would anyone want to leave the crew with Nami as Captain? A thousand thoughts that hadn't surfaced when it was just Nami and himself started taking over when he saw Chopper again.

Nami was enjoying herself as she could tell the inner turmoil Luffy was going through.She herself wasn't sure how the rest of the crew would react (except for Sanji), she had faith that it would work out. She would allow Luffy's silence from not responding to her by one of the ways that she told him to respond to her until the crew was informed. Afterwards, however, she would make sure Luffy verbally responded to every order she gave him with the proper respect.

"What's wrong with Luffy, Nami? He's not another imposter is he?" asked Chopper.

"No, he is the real Luffy. He's probably thinking about how to tell the rest of the crew about something important."

"Something important? Is everything alright?"

"Luffy will tell everyone when everyone together again." Nami glanced at Luffy indicating that it was a subtle order that he, and not she, would inform the crew about who the new Captain is.

"Ok" said Chopper worriedly as he glanced at Luffy. Soon enough (although it felt like forever to Luffy), the trio and the bird made it to the Thousand Sunny with the rest of the crew cheering and calling out their names.

111312111121.content:
As the crew started to settle down after their 2 year reunion and Rayleigh gave Nami the instructions about how to navigate the Thousand Sunny underwater, Nami then cleared her voice.

"Before we set off to Fishman Island, Luffy has an announcement for everyone."

Luffy got nervous as he felt the eyes of the crew on him, waiting for him to speak.

"I am stepping down as the Captain of the crew. Captain Nami is the new Captain."

It was silent for a moment before Luffy could hear some cheers. Luffy looked at his friends and saw not one person was upset with the news!

"Clearly if you are stepping down as Captain, then you aren't suited to be Captain at all. Nami is very tight with money, but at least she's smart and knows how to get through the crazy weather the New World will bring," said Zoro.

"I'm perfectly fine with Captain Nami-swan being in charge now," said the swooning Sanji.

"With Nami as the Captain, we'll finally have a Captain who isn't reckless and follows strategies," said Usopp, with Chopper and Brook nodding their friends in agreement.

"Well, this is a shocking turn of events. I can't say I'm shocked though. I think Nami will do great," added Robin.

"I guess we're all in agreement then with the new Captain being Nami," noted Franky.

Hearing all his friends support Nami unanimously as the new Captain shocked him. He didn't think they would be this happy to see the change. Luffy went to the floor on his knees in shock.

"If Luffy isn't the Captain anymore, what is his new position?" asked Chopper with everyone turning to face Nami.

"Well, Luffy doesn't have any real special talents or abilities outside of fighting, and even that is dangerous to his body via the Gears. I think..."

We need someone smarter, someone who follows strategies. I knew I was a better leader than him and I knew that even after 2 years, I could still beat him."

This was a turning point in Luffy's life that he'd never forget. When they reached Sabaody, Luffy found himself quickly put into a new situation alright.

Disco's auction house was no more. The man was homeless and on the streets due to Doflamingo abandoning him. Now, the slave trade took place at the back of Grove 1. It took a few hours of prep but finally Luffy was ready to be put on the line as a new item to buy.

Going down the line of purchasable items was a few tontattas, a former pirate vice-captain in a large red hat, a few fishman, and the biggest and best sale of the day, the crying, blubbering, whimpering, sobbing, former pirate captain Monkey D. Luffy, dressed in a diaper with a pacifer around his neck and a pink baby girl shirt, restrained with normal handcuffs that he found he couldn't break.

"B-But... I was... supposed to go on my adventure...noooo..." Luffy whimpered.
11131211212112112111121.title: Caribou Finds a Spare Boat and Leaves

choices: She Rides on Luffy all the way Home
She Puts on a Show for the Remaining People at the Auction to Humiliate Him
111312112121121121111212.content:
"Ooooh! Daddy! Momma! Look at this!" A little girl wearing the ridiculous outfit of the world nobles came toddling up to the still crying Luffy. "This is the pirate worth 400 Million!" The girl said. The bubble on her head was sloshing about as she shook with excitement.

The man in charge of the slave trade saw her and rung his hands about. "Would you like to own him little lady? The auction begins in five minutes so get your most esteemed parents to bid quickly now." He said kindly to her.

The girl smiled. Luffy shook with fear.

When the auction began, everyone else who was up for being bought and sold were taken rather quickly. However, there was an expected fight over Luffy.

"400 Million!"

"500 Million!"

"700 Million!"

"1 BILLION!"

Luffy saw all these people gunning for him and felt his fear rise. The little girl giggled as she even saw Luffy wet his diaper from the fear. She wanted him even more now! She could tell Luffy knew the exact reason these people wanted him. It wasn't because he was a famous pirate with a high bounty and thus probably a really strong worker. He was a novalty case. The fact that Straw Hat Luffy had disappeared for 2 years after his biggest failure and come back to them as a pathetic diaper baby was something people wanted to showcase as the downfall of piratehood and what it meant when you chose this path.

They wanted to buy him so that they could stomp all over whatever remained of his pride.

"2 BILLION!" The little girl's parents finally stated.

No one went any higher. And that was that.

The girl charged happily at Luffy with her hands out. "YAY! MINE! MINE! MINE!" She ran up to him and the first thing she did was slap him across the face so hard he fell over and hit the ground with his diapered butt sticking up.

"Owiee..." Luffy whimpered.

"You're mine now. I can do whatever I want to you. WHATEVER I want!" She grinned evilly.
111312112121121121111212.title: A Little Girl World Noble Wants to Buy Luffy

choices: The girl World Noble wants to go home now.
The girl World Noble continues to torture Luffy for everyone to see.
A small break to see how the Tangerine Pirates are doing.
1113121121211211211112122.content:
"Now then everyone," announced the child World Noble. "Watch as I humiliate this former pirate for all the bad things he's done to the mighty World Government, the very organization my esteemed and honored ancestor helped create all those years ago!"

The crowd then cheered her on, althouhg it was unclear whether it was because they agreed with everything she said or because they feared what would happen if they disagreed with her. The girl then walked up to Luffy and stretched his arms out vert long. She then placed Luffy's wrists on the ground and dug a knee into each of Luffy's wrists at the same time.

"Owwww!" yelled Luffy in pain. "Please stop!"

"Don't order me around! I'm a World Noble and you're a slave."

The girl then released his arms and Luffy's arms then snapped back so fast that they hit him hard in the face, causing him to roll on the ground.

"Darling, shouldn't we be going home now?" asked her father. "You can do all this and so much more at home. There's no need for you to put on a show for these commoners. It's beneath you."

"Oh let her have her fun," said the girl's mother. "Besides, ths way the newspapers will run with the story of this pirate's downfall. Besides...he's the sonn of that damned Dragon who wants to overthrow us and he has the middle initial of 'D.' He must suffer great punishment!"

"You do have a point," responded the girl's father.

Meanwhile, the girl, who had stopped listening to her parents' conversation, had ran to Luffy and started punching him in the face, causing him to cry and beg for mercy.
1113121121211211211112122.title: She Puts on a Show for the Remaining People at ...

choices: Luffy Vs. The Teddy Bear in a Fight to the Death!
Luffy Tries to Escape to the Bathroom Again
111312112121121121113.content:
Luffy stood back up after tripping over the soft, virtually harmless teddy bear... before is eyes rolled up and he passed out onto the floor. Apparently, even a teddy bear, that wasn't even alive, could knock this pathetic pirate baby out. Those two years were a complete waste of time.

Luffy drooled on the floor and messed the diaper even more then before, dreaming of giant teddy bears grabbing him while he was dressed like a baby and force feeding him a bottle. He panicked and felt himself get bloated with the milk, peeing his diaper, and ultimately getting dazed as a result. He was stuck like this all through his unconscious stupor.

When Luffy woke up, he noticed something odd. His diaper was still full and the room was empty. Luffy turned to the teddy bear on the floor and growled at it.

"Stupid teddy bear!" Luffy snapped and kicked at the bear. It bounced off the wall and smacked against Luffy's face, making him spin around with his eyes crossed again. Luffy drooled and shook his butt like a baby pretending it knew how to dance before he sighed and fainted once more with his diapered rump in the air, letting out even more of a mess.

Luffy woke up again and rubbed his head. He looked back and saw the bear there. "Dumb bear! You think you can beat me huh! I'll show you!" Luffy snapped and went to grab it with his arm. When he brought his arm back the bear's paw hit him again. Luffy immediately fell back unconscious again with the bear landing on his tummy.

The fourth time Luffy woke up he snarled in intense anger this time. His face was super red. "THAT'S IT! I don't have time for this any more. I've got to change my diaper before someone sees me and I keep wasting time everytime I get knocked- I mean go to sleep!" Luffy snarled in anger.

It was time to make a decision.
111312112121121121113.title: Luffy Falls Down in Unconsciousness

choices: Luffy puts them on willingly.
Nami has to force them on Luffy.
111312112121122.content:
Luffy pulled out what looked like Nami's clothes that she wore during the Arlong situation, but upon closer look, the green camisole had been altered. The green flowers on the camisole had been changed and now they looked like green tangerines.

Luffy looked at the camisole and then turned to Nami.

"Captain Nami, this looks like one of your old outfits, the one you wearing during that whole thing with Arlong in fact. But the shirt looks different..."

"Of course it's different. I altered it. You see, when Nojiko and I were growing up, Belle-mere would often alter Nojiko's old clothes when Nojiko was done with them before they were passed to me. To continue along with that "tradition", I thought it'd be funny if from now on, you wore my old clothes...altered of course when I see fit, such as changing the flowers to look tangerines."

Luffy dropped the outfit in shock."You can't be serious. I'm not going to wear this..."

"Captain's orders, Luffy. Wear them or I'll force them on you. You choose."
111312112121122.title: Altered old clothes of Nami.

choices: Things are going smoothly as they keep going down.
They run into the Caribou Pirates and the Krakken.
1113121121211222.content:
"There's no way I'm wearing your old clothes!" said Luffy as he stood up and gave Nami a glare.

"Very well, then. I guess I'll have to make you then."

Luffy didn't respond but immediately went into Gear Second and shot some Jet Pistols at Nami, but she easily dodged everything. She then took er Clima Tact and hit him with it like a regular staff, which caused him pain. She then followed up by firing lightning out of it at Luffy, which electrocuted him and caused him pain. The remaining members of the new Tangerine Pirates were surprised at seeing lightning affect Luffy firsthand and that Nami was mopping the floor with Luffy when he was serious.

Nami walked up to Luffy and said "Time to get changed, Luffy."

"Nooo" muttered Luffy ashe put a very weak resistance to Nami changing his clothes, The first thing she did was pull out a pair or orange panties. She then took the green camisole and put it on Luffy. She then proceeded to put on the black pants she wore with that camisole and followed it up with putting on a pair of Nami's heeled sandals.

When Nami was finished, she stood up and looked down at Luffy, who was in pain, but also had a huge blush on hisface at embarrassment. Meanwhile, the remainder of the crew looked at Luffy in disgust at how weak he was. They were all very glad at that moment that Nami was their Captain now.

"Do you understand how weak you are compared to me? I can literally force you to wear anything I want you to. I'm going to enjoy having you wear other old clothes of mine."

Nami then left to go make sure the Thousand Sunny was heading in the right direction, which it was.
1113121121211222.title: Nami has to force them on Luffy.

choices: Luffy is asleep on duty.
Luffy is awake on duty.
11131211212112221.content:
Things were going well for their travel down the deep sea, so the Tangerine Pirates, except for Luffy who was still just lying on the ground pathetically, gathered around to catch up on what happened to them all over the last 2 years. Thebiggest shock was when Franky revealed why Kuma had separated them, that he was a Revolutionary Army member, but then he became a full Pacifista,

Nami even asked Sanji to make everyone lunch, to which Sanji happily agreed. When Sanji was done cooking, they all gathered around to start eating, but something felt different.

"Something feels different. It's quieter than it used to be," said Usopp.

"Yeah, Luffy isn't trying to steal everyone's food," replied Zoro.

Nami and the rest turned to see that Luffy hadn't moved from his spot.

"Lunch is ready, Luffy. Aren't you going to eat?" asked Nami.

"I'm not hungry," replied Luffy to the happiness of Nami and the shock of everyone else.

"Very well then, suit yourself. But sice you're not eating, get off the deck and do something productive. Go be on lookout for any problems that may occur," ordered Nami.

"Yes, Captain Nami," answered Luffy as he got off the deck and got to the lookout area. The crew had a good laugh at seeing Luffy walking around in Nami's old clothes.

"Oh man, what you did to Luffy was funny and liberating. You saved us from going to the New World with him as our Captain," said Usopp.

"Yeah, I was disappointed at first, but now I see that it was for the best. We all spent the last 2 years training for this moment and Luffy seems to have regressed," added Chopper.

"It's really pathetic that we're all out trying to fulfill our own dreams and now Luffy's dream is over," said Zoro.

"He's nothing like his father. Dragon-san is a great leader that everyone in the Revolutionary Army respects. Luffy, on the hand, lost the respect of our crew and his position as Captain," added Robin.

"I hope this is an indication that his appetite will go down. I was always angry that Luffy would always sneak in the middle of the night, trying to raid the fridge," said Sanji.

"Not to mention, we would always overspend on food just to satisfy one day's worth of food for him," added Nami. "We're not doing that again. I say that from now on, when he eats with us, we all steal his food. That'll teach him a lesson and he'll eat less too. We'll also be able to save more money, too!"

"Good idea!" said everyone.

"The way that Luffy has fallen is certainly not super!" said Franky.

"I wasn't in the crew for very long when we were all separated, but her's to Captain Nami's reign being much, much longer than Luffy's!" added Brook.

"Here, here. Cheers!" added everyone except Nami, while she just thanked them for their support.

Nami then looked in the directionthat Luffy was before she ordered him to be on lookout duty.

"I'm going to check up on Luffy. It's been quiet and I don't trust him to do a good job," said Nami as she got from the table and left, looking for Luffy.
11131211212112221.title: Things are going smoothly as they keep going down.

choices: Nami takes away his Straw Hat as punishment.
Nami blindfolds Luffy for the remainder of the journey to Fishman Island.
Nami punishes him some other way.

When Nami got to where Luffy was, she scowled at the sight of Luffy sleeping without a care in the world. Nami sghed a bit before she threw a punch at Luffy, which promptly woke him up.

"Ouch!" yelled Luffy clutched his head. He turned around and saw that Nami was behind him and she was not happy.

Luffy gulped. "Oh yeah. I guess I didn't notice that I had fallen asleep."

Luffy was a little scared at Nami's dismissal of his apology. He was afraid of she might do next.

1113121121211222112.content:
After a few moments of thinking, Nami went over to wear her suitcase was, which caused Luffy to shiver. After what she did earlier to put him in one of her old outfits, he knew that it wouldn't go well for him.

As Nami was going through her suitcase, she rummaged a bit before she found what she was looking for. She pulled it out to reveal that it was one of her old bras.

Luffy looked worried at Nami. "What are you going to do with that bra?"

"Since you can't be relied on to be on lookout, I'm taking away your sight for a while. I'm going to be blindfold you with this old bra of mine and it'll stay on until at least we get to Fishman Island. Understood?"

"Please, Captain Nami. I'm begging you! Don't do that. I want to continue see our voyage down and I want to see what Fishman Island looks like from the outside."

"No can do, Luffy. You brought this on yourself by sleeping on the job."

Nami then walked up to Luffy and told him to turn around, to which he listened.Nami then tied the bra around his head so that it was completely covering his eyesight.

"I'm so sorry, Captain Nami," repeated Luffy, only this time, Luffy sounded more apologetic.

"I beileve that one, Luffy, but you still have to serve your punishment. You disobeyed the job your Captain gave you and you must be punished."

Nami then thought what she should do with the blindfolded Luffy.
1113121121211222112.title: Nami blindfolds Luffy for the remainder of the ...

choices: Nami and Luffy are separated from the crew and wake up.
The whole crew is all together and they wake up.
11131211212112221122.content:
Nami had had enough witht Luffy for now, so she decided that if Luffy wanted to sleep so much, then so be it. She gave him a hard chop to the back of his neck, which caused him to lose consciousness instantly.

Soon afterwards, the rest of the crew were finished eating and went to where Nami and Luffy were. They all had a good laugh at Luffy, who was not only wearing Nami's old clothes, but also now wearing one of her old bras as a blindfold. When Nami explained why she did it and why he was unconscious, the crew just shook their heads in disappointment.

The crew then continued their descent to Fishman Island and the crew, save for Luffy, worked together to avoid the Caribou Pirates altogether and get away from the various sea monsters they saw. They even saw the famous Flying Dutchman and un undersea volcano erupt. They continued their voyage and eventually made it to Fishman Island, but were greeted by some sea monsters and a few fishmen.

"You're the famous Straw Hat Pirates aren't you, said one of the fishmen. "We've heard so much about you, especially your captain, Monkey D. Luffy. You took down the Arlong Pirates, but then protected Hachi from becoming a slave and attacked the Tenryuubito 2 years ago and the Sabaody Archipelago. You went against those disgusting World Nobles, just like our hero, Fisher Tiger, did so long ago. So, what will it be? Will you all join under our New Fishman Pirates or reject us? Will you live or we will you sink you to your deaths right here and now?" asked the fishman Hammond.

Nami saw the old Arlong tattoo on his body, so she knew instantly what his opinions of humans were.

"First off, your information is outdated," started Nami.

"Outdated?" asked Hammond.

"The pirate known as Monkey D. Luffy is no longer the Captain and we're no longer the Straw Hat Pirates. My name is Nami and I'm now the Captain of the Tangerine Pirates."

Nami then held up the unconscious Luffy and Hammond was taken aback. He could clearly see that Luffy was wearing a bra as a blindfold and was wearing women's clothes. But he also knew the name Nami as well.

"I know who you are, too! You were one of Arlong's top people annd was his map maker when he was trying to conquer East Blue!"

"My whole "association" with Arlong was just a negotiation to get my freedom back. I was never loyal to him. Besides, he's in prison now."

"Why you..."

"Although, because of the stuff that happened to Hachi at the Sabaody Archipelago 2 years ago, I have forgiven him."

Nami then glanced at her crew and nodded her head to Franky to indicate what her plan was.

"As far as your options, I'm going to decline both. We're getting into Fishman Island and we're not joining you. Now, Franky!"

"At once, Captain! Coup ed Burst!"

And with that, the Thousand Sunny shot like a rocket towards Fishman Island, but as they entered, they all began to drown.
11131211212112221122.title: Nami puts him back to "sleep" for now.

choices: The Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets Spank Luffy!
Luffy tries to Fight the Quintuplets Instead!
111312112121122211221.content:
"WAAAH!" Luffy screamed as he shot up from the cushion he was laying on. "Wha-?" He looked around and recognized that he was no longer in a familiar looking area. It would seem that he was in someone's very fishy looking home. Was this Fishman Island? Before Luffy could even process this, he was chopped on the head by a familiar feeling hand.

"Shut up! Don't scream like that idiot!" Nami shouted.

A large bump grew on Luffy's head and the former pirate captain whined as he grabbed at it. "C-Captain Nami? N-No wait..." Luffy pondered what this could mean for a second. Of course! He was in an unfamiliar place. The last thing he remembered was a very weird series of events that led to Nami defeating him and some more darkness... him waking up naked and then being forced into her old clothes followed by more darkness...

It all made sense now though. That was all a dream!

"Phew! Looks like we made it huh Nami?" Luffy said and began laughing.

Nami punched Luffy in his teeth.

Luffy tumbled along the floor and smashed into the floor with his butt sticking up.

"Sorry about that Camie." Nami said to the mermaid friend they were currently held up in with. Camie laughed as she turned around with a pan in her hand as well as five little kid mermaids circling around her body.

"It's okay Nami-chin. If anything, I certainly believe you when you say you're the captain now." Camie said with a grin.

Luffy shot up and screamed in pain before snapping to Nami's direction. "NO WAY! Th-that had to have been a dream! It was a dream! You're NOT the captain!"

Five seconds later, Nami was holding Luffy up by the scruff of his neck. His eyes were flooded with tears, he was missing a tooth, he had a black ring around his eye, both of his eyes were completely white, stars and birdies circled his head, his hair was messed up, and several anime bumps were on his head.

"Was that beating I just gave you a dream?" Nami asked him.

"N-No... no more... please... I'm sorry C-Captain Nami..." Luff whined.

Nami yanked Luffy on to his wobbly feet and turned him around. She then swung back and spanked his bottom hard for a good 10 swats.

"He's getting spanked." Ichika said.
"He's getting SPANKED!" Nika said.
"He's not getting spanked." Sanka said.
"He might not be getting spanked." Yonka said.
"So what if he's getting spanked?" Yonka Two said.

"Sh-Shut up!" Luffy cried as his butt tingled from the pain. He couldn't even muster the stones to whine about how awful it was to be spanked by Nami like that in front of those little kids.

"Can we try?" Ichika asked.
"CAN WE TRY?!" Nika asked.
"Can we not try?" Sanka said.
"We might be able to try." Yonka said.
"So what if we try?" Yonka Two said.

"Sure. Spank him till his butt is as red as a tomato girls." Nami said, holding onto Luffy's arm and yanking his pants down so that the orange panties can be seen.

"NO! NOOO~!" Luffy whined and cried. Spankings hurt the absolute worst!

11131211212112221122111.content:
"Nami-chin, I have an idea based on what you said earlier," said Camie.

"Oh?" asked Nami.

The girls then dropped Luffy to the floor and put his pants back on before they all huddled together and whispered so that Luffy couldn't hear them, although it did make Luffy nervous.

They broke from their huddle and Camie said, "Nami-chin said that you didn't eat on your way down. I can get you something to eat."

""I was thinking of making you clams. That should be plenty for you."

"But-"

"You are her guest, Luffy. If she wants to make you a specific food, then you can't argue about what it is. Either accept it or don't,." said Nami.

"Yes, Captain Nami. Clams are fine, Caimie."

"Good."

After a while, Camie got the clams ready andgave some to everyone, not just Luffy. However, just as Luffy was about to dig in, Nami, Camie, and the quintuplets all began to steal from his plate and eat their own clams at the same time. Luffy tried to steal some back, but quick punches from Nami and the mermaids stopped him in his tracks. When they were all done, he was left with just 1 single clam.

"I only have 1 left."

"Take it or leave it, Luffy. This is a little payback from the times you stole from us during meals," said Nami.

Luffy shivered in fear at her words and implications. Would they steal his food from now on, just leaving him with barely anything?

Luffy stared at the single clam and all of a sudden, his stomach growled in hunger, but all that was available was a single clam.

Luffy quickly ate the clam before it could be stolen, but somehow, eating just that small clam made him even hungrier. His stomach protested by growling.

Luffy looked at Nami with begging eyes and asked "Please Captain Nami. Can I please have some more to eat?"

"No can do, Luffy," replied Nami as she shook her head. "For the sake of the crew in multiple ways, you need to eat less. In time, your body will get used to it and you'll become full by eating much less than you normally do."

Luffy just hung his head in sadness as Nami continued.

"Besides, you're wearing my old clothes now. You need to be more concious of your figure. There could be a day when you'll wear what I'm wearing now."

Luffy looked up and blushed at how Nami's attire was very revealing and the thought of being made to wear it.

"You wouldn't even make him wear a shirt with that?", asked Camie as she giggled.

"Not with this get up, no. Obviously I do wear shirts, but not this particular instance. I might change the design a bit on this bikini halter top, but otherwise, he'd have to wear it as is when that day comes."

"Nami, you're very funny," said Ichika.
"Nami, you're very funny!" said Nika.
"Nami, you are not funny," said Sanka.
"Nami, you might be funny," said Yonka.
"Nami, so what if you are funny," said Yonka Two.

"Thanks, I think," replied Nami as an anime sweat came down her face at the antics of the Medaka Mermaid Quintuplets.

Camie swam up to Luffy and shook her head at how Luffy seemed to be so brave and cool 2 years when he punched that World Noble to help her out, but now he looked anything but cool. If it wasn't for all the crazy stuff that happened that day, Camie would have thought it was just a dream, looking at Nami's and Luffy's current situation compared to then.

"So Nami-chin, since you're both the Captain and Navigator, what exactly is Luffy's role now?" asked Camie. The question even got Luffy's attention as he stared at Nami, wanting to know that exact thing.

"To be honest, I don't know," relied Nami as the words stung Luffy. "On our way down here, I had him on lookout duty and he ended up sleeping on the job. Right now, I can't trust him to do any job without surprevision. Otherwise, he'd just fall asleep or decide todo something else."

Nami then paused for a second before continuing.

"I guess for now, I'll make him the cabin boy."

"Cabn boy?!" asked Luffy in sadness and shock.

"That's right, Luffy. That's the only position you're worthy of at the moment."

"Don't you mean cabin girl, Nami-chin?" said a giggling Camie.

"I suppose you're right, Camie. Good one," replied Nami.

"Luffy will be a good cabin girl," said Ichika.
"Luffy will be a a good cabin girl!" said Nika.
"Luffy will not be a good cabin girl" said Sanka.
"Luffy might become a good cabin girl" said Yonka.
"So what if Luffy might become a good cabin girl?" said Yonka Two.

Nami and the mermaids all had a good laugh at Luffy's new position on the Tangerine Pirates as Luffy just wanted the day to end.

1113121121211222112211111.content:
"Alright. Let's see what outfits we can get Luffy-Chin to wear then!" Camie grinned as she did a peppy little fist bump. The Mermaid Quintuplets all did a cheer as well. They wanted to see how this would pan out the most.

"What's that? It looks like your tattoo."

"It's my slave mark for you, Luffy. To me, this tattoo represents the 2 parent fgures of my life. But to you, it means I now own you. Everytime I see it on you, I'll get excited, thinking about this very moment."

After Luffy had defeated Usopp in his duel, they abandoned the Merry and set up shop in a hotel on Water Seven for a bit. Luffy had been crying after his win but then resorted to remaining silent and sitting up in the bed for a while, trying to think things over.

"I said you're going to fix this. As Captain you have to. And if you don't, then you don't deserve to be captain anymore." Nami said to his face. Chopper and Zoro overheard this as they were on their way back to the room at that moment.

"Nami, you're being stupid. What's there to fix? Usopp challenged my authority as captain and I took care of him!" Luffy shouted at her.

"The only reason Usopp quit was because you not only fought back but you almost told him to leave yourself before Sanji had to kick you across the room. Do you have any idea how horrible and childish that is? And now Robin's missing and you're not doing anything! How would you like it if you got kicked out. Then what?" Nami said.

"I can't get kicked out. I'm the captain!" Luffy snaps.

"Then fight me and we'll see if that's true or not. How's about another duel!" Nami said.

"WHAT?!" Luffy was shocked. "B-But-!"

"You're crew is falling apart. Two people have challenged your authority and another straight up went missing. You're unable to do anything about it. Shows how much of a captain you are." Nami said.

Jessica grinned. "Now girls, it's time we started our drills. It's Luffy's first day so show him the ropes."

The girls all grinned.

"Yes Ma'am!" They all said in unison. When Jessica left, the girls instantly knew what to do. They got into their fighting stances and began sparring with one another. Luffy stood and watched for a bit before the girls had no choice but to turn to him and question what was up.

"What is it? Can't fight?" One of them asked.

They weren't sure of that but it sounded encouraging enough. Luffy could tell she was a bit afraid though. She was smiling but sweating a bit. That lack in confidence gave Luffy a huge confidence boost himself.

She caught Luffy's fist and quickly slugged Luffy across his face instead!

Nami saw that Luffy wwas waking up.

"What happened? Where am I?" asked Luffy in a daze.

"You're at my house, which is now where you live too," responded Nami as she opened up the door. "Get inside."

As the memories came to him, Luffy froze up in fear for a bit before he obeyed her and entered the house.

"Let's get one thing straight here. While you're living here, racking up debt by not being able to pay your monthly "fees", you will obey me. I'm getting close to getting the money to get my village free from Arlong and if you do anything to ruin it, like you almost did, you will regret it for the rest of your life. Understand?"

11133221.content:
During the time Nami was learning more about weather and training on Weatheria, she had a lot of time to reflect how she came to stay on the Sky Island. She had thought through from the time she met Luffy, to agreeing to travel with him and Zoro, and then officially joining the crew after Arlong was defeated, and then the crew's journey until they suffered ultimate defeat at Sabaody. The most alarming thing she had to accept was her Captain's leadership, or lack thereof most of the time, wouldn't be fixed by Rayleigh in his training. Nami came to the hard realization that Luffy getting stronger could only increase his recklessness and put the crew into situations they weren't ready for.

With these thoughts in mind, Nami poured even more into her training at Weatheria and after just 18 of the 24 months she originally planned, she felt she had learned everything she needed. She wasn't sure how she would get Rayleigh to agree with what she planned to do, but luckily for her, Rayleigh had just left Luffy to train by himself for the last 6 months.

After some thinking of where Luffy would be, Nami figured the last place the World Government would expect to find Luffy would be in the Calm Belt, so after securing a boat from Weatheria, she used her navigation skills and new weather skills to sail in the Calm Belr that would normally be very dificult to sail bcause of there being no wind.

After some time, she came across an island and wondered if Luffy was there. She docked on the island and took some bags that she would need to complete his "training", she went off in search of him.

1113331.content:
The Straw Hat Pirates had just left Loguetown and they were all a little tired after all that happened. After they had a little time to relax, Nami asked what happened exactly in the town square at Roger's execution platform. Luffy started the story by saying that he was just enjoying the view from where Roger died and that the Buggy Pirates suddenly appeared and then he got trapped up there by them. Nami internally screamed as this as she then heard about the lucky lightning strike that saved Luffy's life at the last second and then the crazy wind that allowed all of them to escape.

After hearing the full story, Nami walked up to Luffy and just punched him hard, sending him to the ground, causing Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp to be surprised.

"You idiot! When will you start acting like a proper Captain? every single place we go to there comes a point where you just show you're not ready."

Luffy shook off the punch and stood back up.

"What are you talking about, Nami? Of course I'm ready. I trained for 10 years in preparation to become a pirate."

"And where has that stopped you from putting yourself or the crew in worse positions that it needs to? When we first met aand I didn't like pirates, you let your guard down and allowed me to tie you up with rope and you were eventually put into a cage by Buggy. During the battle against Kuro's crew, you allowed yourself to get hypnotizrf by that hypnotist. Or how about the Baratie? If it wasn't for Don Krieg, you would've ended up being their chore bot for a whole year. And I heard about how Arlong was able to nearly drown you to begin with. You got your feet trapped by one of your own attacks and needed a lot of help to get out of that mess. And now this..."

"But everything worked out well in the end, so what does it matter?" asked Luffy

"What does it matter?" repeated Nami as Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp also flinched in annoyance at Luffy's nonchalant response. "We are about to enter the Grand Line. How much longer are you just going to rely on dumb luck to fix your mistakes that you cause us? Perhaps this crew woud be better off with a new Captain."

Luffy's eyes widened in surprise.

"You can't be serious, Nami. You don't mean that, that you want me to not be the Captain anymore."

"I'm very serious, Luffy. I hereby challenge you to a duel to decide who will be the Captain from here on out: me or you."

"I can't believe it has come to this. Nami, I will not lose!"

"We'll see about that."

Luffy immediately charged straight at Nami and yelled "Gomu Gomu no Pistol", but Nami just moved slightly to dodge. After Luffy sent a kick at her, which Nami also dodged, Nami pulled out the pieces of her bo staff.and ran at Luffy and hit him, sending him to the ground.

Luffy stood up and said, "Now it's time to get serious, Nami."

This is a duel to decide who'll be the Captain!" yelled Nami, to which Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp all nodded their heads and looked disappointly at Luffy for not going all out from the start in such an important fight.

"It doesn't matter as long as I win in the end," replied Luffy. "Gomu Gomu no Gattling Gun!"

Nami just weaved and dodged through Luffy's rapid punches and when Luffy was done with his attack, his jaw dropped a little.

"Your attacks are meaningless if they can't hit me, Luffy. It's time to end this."

Nami then ran up to Luffy and punched him hard in the gut, causing him to fall to his knees. Nami then strexted Luffy's hands behind his back and tied them up together behind his back.

"You can't get out of that, can you?"

Luffy tried to untangle his hands, but he couldn't. After a few moments, he shook his head sadly.

"Then from now on, I am the new Captain of this crew. From here on out, we are the Tangerine Pirates! If anyone else objects, speak now."

When Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp didn't object (in fact, Sanj was acting happy with Nami being the new Captain), Nami just grinned and looked down at Luffy.

"Now as for you..."

Luffy had an oblivious look as he gazed at the nude Hancock' s back noticing the strange mark on it. (http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20130...)

Hancock looks coldly at the young man who beat her younger sisters in the stadium earlier, while it was impressive she considered it an embarrassment to her family and would restore her honour the only way she knew how. She spoke, "You, male, you have seen the mark on my back and,by law I cannot allow you to live," a small part of her ached at the thought of killing off this man. She turns to face, "But I have a proposition for you, you agree to become my servant and stay by my side for life and I'll let this slide," that small part of her was hoping he'd take her offer.

Luffy declined, "I can't be a servant I have a dream,"

Hancock would normally not care, but something about this man compelled her to ask, "What is your dream male? "

Luffy replied, "My name isn't male it's Luffy Monkey D. Luffy and my dream is to..." He gives his usual sunny grin, "find the treasure One Piece and become King of the Pirates!"

Hancock blushed lightly from his smile, That smile its so beautiful nearly as beautiful as me! This man I must have him! "Well Luffy-san if you agree to become my servant I will help you find One Piece, "

"Really?!" Luffy said looking at her.


Hancock nods, "You have my word...agree to serve by my side and you shall have the resoruces needed to find One Piece."

Luffy grins, "Shishishishishishishishishishi! Alright then what do I need to do? "

Hancock blushed from his grin again, "Your first order is to wash my back," she turns so her back is facing him,

Luffy blinks seeing,her move her long raven hair aside revealinf her slender back and the mark on it. Luffy scratched his head, "What should I use?"

Hancock thinks on what to have her new servant man use.

11331.content:
The beautiful empress of Amazon Lilly and only female Shichibukai Boa Hancock sighed as she rubbed her temples in frustration, she wore a blue variation of the outfit she had worn when she first encountered Luffy on her island 2 years ago. Luffy was here visiting her, but as usual only thought of his stomach and remained blissfuly unaware of her feelings for him. Now Hancock dearly and truly loved Luffy, but she was getting so very tired of him being oblivious to her feelings.

Hancock was sitting on her throne as she thought on how to get through to her blockhead straw hat beau. She knew dropping subtle hints wouldn't be near enough to get through his thick rubbery skull. She also knew that trying to seduce one of the other men of his crew to make him jealous and realize his love for her wouldn't work either due to his strong bond with his crew. She racked her brain trying to think of something that would work to get him to commit himself to her. Her snake weapon/partner Salome was beside the throne watching her as she thought silently.


Then it occurred to Hancock, maybe she should be more forceful and direct towards him. She had been told by Luffy how his orange haired navigator Nami scared him and could get him to even do things just by yelling at him. Maybe that would be the way to make him finally love her. As much as it pained her to be even slightly mean to Luffy, it might be the only hope she has to get him to return her feelings.

Hancock sighed, "Sometimes its hard being a ruler and so beautiful," She gets up out of her throne and walks to the dinning area where Luffy was eating. She tries to steel her nerves to start her plan.

Hancock was in thought after Luffy told her about his crew. He had two women on it by the names of Nami and Nico Robin. She knew about Robin's status as the 'demon child' who didn't know of her? She was also quite aware of the pirate thief known as Nami.

Hancock frowned as she thought of the two women. Luffy has known them longer, what if they try to take him from me? "Are you in anyway involved with them?" Hancock asked hoping for the answer to be negative.

Luffy answered of course oblivious to what she truly meant by that word, "Involved with them? Yeah they're my Nakama! My crewmates! I watch out for them and protect them like any good captain would!"

Hancock let out a quiet breath of relief. So he only views them as friends and crew members nothing more…That's just what I hoped for! She smiled and blushed. Now that she knew they weren't potential rivals, she could try to stake her claim on Luffy.

Hancock smiles to Luffy, "If you're still hungry Luffy I can have another feast made for you,"

Luffy grinned, "Really?! I could always go for another feast!"

Hancock giggles and goes to tell her cooks to make another feast only this time to add a little something extra to the food.

As the Straw Hat Pirates were walking to where the Rebel Army was based at within Alabasta, Luffy stopped walking and sat by a tree.

"What are you doing, Luffy-san?" asked Vivi as she noticed Luffy stopped walking.

"What are you talking about, Luffy? We don't have time fot your whims right now," replied Usopp.

"He's right, "added Sanji as he got up to Luffy. We're going to retrace our path back to Katorea and stop the Rebel Army. If 1,000,000 people go to war, it's all over. This is for Vivi-chan. Let's go."

"I don't care," as he grabbed Sanji and threw him aside. "Vivi, I want to beat up Crocodile. You don't want anyone to die. Not the 1,000,000 people about to go to war. Not any of us. Crocoile is one of the Shichibukai, after all, and you want no one to get hurt. Aren't you just fooling yourself?"

Vivi then burst out "What's wrong with that? What's wrong with not wanting people to die?"

"People die," responded Luffy.

Vivi then ran up to Luffy and smacked him hard. "That's what we're trying to prevent. Not the Royal Army! Not the Rebel Army! I thought you knew this all along, Luffy-san?"

Luffy then jumped up and tried to hit Vivi, but Vivi dodged his punch and connected with a punch of her own. Vivi was so worked up that it actually sent Luffy to the ground. The Straw Hat Pirates just stood there, hoping that this would be resolved soon.

Vivi then pounced on Luffy and started slamming him repeatedly into the desert sand. "Crocodile is on a completely different level than his subordinates tht we have faced already. From what I understand from my research of him, he's a Logia Devil Fruit user that makes it nearly impossible to hit his real body!" The Straw Hat Pirates gasped at Crocodile's advantage. "You can't defeat Crocodile! No one here can! That's why we are going to the Rebel Army and tell them the truth to stop the war. Understand, Luffy-san?"

Finding his arms out of commission Luffy hopped on one foot sending out the other, but instead of getting hit or even dodging it Vivi grabbed his foot and snapped it back sending Luffy into the tree. Seeing the eveyone of the Straw Hats burst out laughing to seeing their captain sitting on his own head and his arms tied up like pretzels. "SO Luffy do you concede?" Vivi asked. Luff...

Luffy was so shocked at what just happened. He hadn't felt such a defeat by an opponent by taking such an advantage over his rubber body in years. It brought him back to when he first met Ace and Sabo and he was having trouble throwing a single punch due to his rubber body being a fairly new thing at the time. As he started thinking about the past, he thought about the day that he and Ace were told that Sabo had been killed as he was leaving the island. It was at that point that he finally was thinking about Vivi's point of view and he calmed himself down and so he had no problem with feiting to his friend.

"I forfeit, Vivi," said Luffy. He had momentarily forgotten that he was in the middle of a wager with Vivi.

The Straw Hats behind her just raised their eyebrows at their friend using her princess title for selfish reasons; this was the first time she had done something like this since they have met her. In fact, up until this moment, she never asked for any type of special treatment due to her status.

"Fine," said Luffy, thinking that she would just order them to stop the Rebel and Royal Armies from fighting. 'We're friends. It's not like she'll do anything that bad. Right?' thought Luffy.

"Help me!" yelled Luffy. "Vivi, please help me."
