114132.content:
"DAMMIT VIVI!" Luffy snarled as he tried to get his arms untied and shuffled about so that he was standing on his own two feet again instead of sitting on his own head. Vivi had made him look stupid just then and his crew couldn't help but giggle at him. Luffy huffed aloud as his face got a little red with embarrassment. He tugged hard at his own arms and danced a bit in place, before successfully getting the knot they were tied into undone.

"Dammit what Luffy? You're trying to tell me that you can't do the impossible now? Sorry but we're going to the rebels to tell them to stop. Crocodile will get defeated but only with their help." Vivi said.

"I'M gonna kick Crocodile ass Vivi!" Luffy snapped and rushed at her.

"Oh really? How are you gonna do that-?" Vivi jumped out of the way when Luffy went for a Gum Gum Stamp. With his leg stretched out, Vivi grabbed it and began twisting it. "-When you can't even take me on?" She then let his twisted leg go and watched Luffy jitter around like a mechanical corkscrew.

"Gegegegegeegeeee~!" Luffy jitttered up and down before his leg snapped back into place. He growled and tried to launch a straight punch at her this time. Vivi rolled out of the way and kicked his fist back at him. It bounced along the sand and smacked him in the face! "GAAAH!"

He fell back hard on his butt and grabbed his nose. "MY NOSE! DAMMIT!"

Vivi rushed towards him, ready to tackle him again. Luffy looked up and spun to the side when she struck the sand with her foot! Luffy smirked and went for his Gum Gum Whip!

Vivi merely pulled on her Peacock String slasher that she had laid out as a trap and got Luffy's other leg snared up within it. When she pulled on it, Luffy fell into the sand and the whip attack flew over her head and came back around to snap back into his head. This sent his head flying back a bit.

Vivi tugged on the peacock string and spun his body in the sand, tying him up in it. Luffy growled and bounced around in anger, trying to bite at it.

"LET ME OUT OF THIS!"

"If you insist!" Vivi pulled the string again and spun Luffy out of it like a top. When he stopped spinning, Luffy grabbed his head to focus his rolling eyeballs.

When his vision focused though he saw Vivi's face collide with his face!

Luffy spat backwards as his head jerked back a bit. Luffy was sweating and blushing with exhaustion and humiliation now. He went for a swift punch but Vivi grabbed his fist, twisted it, then punched him hard in the gut.

Luffy's eyes widened in tremendous pain as he folded over Vivi's fist and slumped a bit.

She then kicked upward, landing a shot to his crotch. A tiny spurt of pee shot into his shorts. Luffy's face contorted to look even more goofy.

She then delivered a swift uppercut which knocked Luffy off his feet and made him land hard onto his back with his arms splayed out and his legs in the air,

Vivi panted before looking down at him.

Luffy's body hit the sand with his eyes rolling and fluttering in a daze. The front of his shorts had a small wet patch of pee on the front of it. And he was out cold.

"We're going to the rebels." Vivi declared.

1141321.content:
Vivi and the rest of the Straw Hats continued on their journey towards the rebels. Vivi was using her Peacock String slasher as sort of a leash, dragging him along the desert. This would stop once Luffy woke up, since Vivi had different plans for him, but for now it got Luffy moving while everyone else was continuing on their mission. Eventually, Luffy did wake up and he was not happy.

"Hey! What's the big idea here? Let me go!'"

"Oh, you're finally awake, Luffy? That's great," replied Vivi as she released him from his leash.

Luffy slowly got up and glared at Vivi for a second before the memories of his defeat began to come back. Once he realized the humiliation that he had suffered when he was defeated by Vivi, Luffy began to blush in embarrassment and shift his eyes all around, away from Vivi's face.

"So I see that you remember what happened when you tried to fight me, right?"

Luffy just weakly nodded his head.

"Answer me verbally when I ask you a question, Luffy!"

"Yes, I remember Vivi."

"And we are heading to the rebels without any more problems from you, right?"

"Yes, Vivi."

"And you agree to be my camel, right?"

"Yes, Vivi. Wait, what?!"

"You heard me. I don't trust you that you won't try something to head towards Crocodile instead. Being my camel will allow me to have more control over your body," replied Vivi.

"This is ridiculous. Come on gus, back me up here," said Luffy addressing his crew.

"I love this side of Vivi, too!" exclaimed Sanji with hearts in his eyes.

"You're not really in a position to argue, Luffy. We all saw how weak you are compared to Vivi. Besides, if you're a good camel,maybe Vivi will let me ride," added Nami.

"Of course you can if you want, Nami. You're a good friend of mine," said Vivi.

It was a very normal looking day at the Great Gaol, Impel Down... however, the latest acquisition to the ranks of the prisoners was anything but!

"Bring in the prisoner!" Magellan shouted into the speaker. Hannyabal, as the new Warden after 2 years had passed, was happy that Magellan was still the most respected man in the prison and voluntarily took up parts of the job that were still too much for most of them. However, Magellan had a vested interest in their latest guest.

The person being brought it with Seastone handcuffs and a bit of a ruffled up set of clothes was none other than Monkey D. Luffy!

He had a huge scar on his chest and a significantly higher bounty but after getting his butt kicked by Kaido, fleeing, and then being ambushed by Coby and a gang of Marines, he was eventually beaten and taken here.

Luffy was lead in with the cuffs around his arms, grinning up at Magellan when he entered.

"Hey. Poison Blowfish man. I'm surprised I'm seeing you again." Luffy smirked with confidence. He may have been captured but he wasn't feeling any kind of fear. His crew had managed to escape. In fact, they were still facing down the enemy. Once they were done, they were sure to come and get him. He'd just have to brave this dumb place.

"Straw Hat Luffy..." Magellan leered down at him. "It does the heart good knowing that you've come to grace the stone walls of this prison. Of course, you've earned yourself a nice spot on the lowest level but that doesn't mean you won't get to partake in the wonders offered by every level of this prison on your way down."

"Ha. Bring it on. I'm the man whose gonna be King of the Pirates. I escaped this place two years ago when I was tired and desperate. Now that I'm way stronger, there's no chance that it can hold me." Luffy said confidently. "I'll finally be able to beat you, Poison Blowfish Man."

"... You sound confident, but I'm sure this prison can break your spirit." Magellan said, before turning to the side. "You're not the only one whose leveled up. When she heard you were coming she wanted a crack at you the most, so I allowed it. You're in the hands of Sadie-Chan from now on."

"S-Sadie... chan?" Luffy tilted his head in confusion and blinked. He didn't know if he remembered such a person. It wasn't until he felt the crack of a whip against his butt that he got a deep rooted impression of her! "YEEEOWWWW~!"

Luffy jumped and hopped about, wiggling his butt out and tearing up due to not being able to rub his behind. "Who did that...? Eh?"

15221.content:
"Lucy! I won! Lu-?" Rebecca stopped running as she saw the person walking down the corridor in front of her. It looked like Lucy. He was dressed like Lucy. But his posture, demeanor, and all around presence had changed. What was the meaning of this? It looked like he was standing next to the Bartolomeo guy too. He was also going to be one of the finalists for the match. Odd.

"Hey. Young lady. Do you know my fabulous sempai?" Bartolomeo asked Rebecca as the two of them stopped. "Lucy" simply put his hand on Bart's shoulder to quiet him down and then walked up to Rebecca with a calm look on his face.

"Y-You... You're not Lucy are you? Who are you?" Rebecca asked.

"... You're Rebecca." The man in the disguise spoke. "Don't worry. I know all about your story. This place reminds me a lot of the place we used to grow up in. I'll be sure to get rid of the darkness that cloud's this kingdom." He said as he walked right by Rebecca. Rebecca was a bit taken aback. His voice was totally different as well. That wasn't Lucy at all...!

"HEY!" Rebecca shouted.

The man stopped.

"I asked you a question. Who are you?" Rebecca demanded. "Where is Lucy?"

152212.content:
"It's best that you don't know..." Sabo said right before he continues to walk along.

Rebecca snarled and ran forward. Bartolomeo jolted and quickly put up a barrier behind Sabo. She lashed her sword down at him and it struck the barrier, making her attack bounce off of it as though nothing had happened. That managed to get Sabo to stop walking again.

"You attacked me?" Sabo turned, a bit surprised.

"Of course I did. Lucy's gone and you've taken his place and you expect me to just believe you when you say you'll make things better. I'm the one whose going to kill Doflamingo and protect Soldier-San to the death. I'll do it by winning the Flame Flame Fruit too." Rebecca snapped.

"... You can't beat Doflamingo." Sabo said merely.

"WHAT?!" Rebecca snapped.

"Hey now...! Don't...!" Bartolomeo tried to speak up but Sabo put his hand up.

"Put the barrier down and go to the ring Bart-Guy." Sabo said.

"It's Bartolomeo..." Bart said with a grumble. However, he did as he was told. "Whatever happens, be sure to respect the wishes of my sempai!" He shouted before heading to the ring.

Sabo stared down at Rebecca. "Okay... so what if I still refuse to tell you who I am? What then?"

"I'll defeat you. Here and now." Rebecca said.

"Really? Hmph. The other Lucy isn't coming back you know. He entrusted this job to me. Friend of his or not, I can't go back on my promise." Sabo said with his arms crossed. "We do this here or we settle it like normal in the ring."

"I'm glad I've found you too Luffy." Chocolat smirked as she narrowed her eyes at him. Oh the boss was going to love this. As soon as she got led him back to him, she'd ambush him from behind and that'd be the end of the real captain too! "Follow me. I know where the others are!"

"Oh? That's awesome!" Luffy said with a chipper voice. "We'll be able to leave for Fishman Island real early at this rate."

"H-Hold on a second!" Nami stammered from the ground and stood up, covered in scared sweat. "I-I'm Nami! It's me Luffy! I'm the real Nami!"

"Hmm?" Luffy turned his head and looked at her.

He than looked between the both of them and then frowned at the Real Nami.

"Nami wouldn't be caught dead wearing embarrassing stuff like that. Not even I would like wearing a diaper and baby stuff." Luffy said with a raised brow. "Plus she was pushing you around in a stroller. You've got to be some kind of overgrown baby or something."

Nami seethed and clenched her fists together. "What'd you say?!"

"Oh no. She isn't." Chocolat said. Nami looked at her in surprise. "She's worse than that," she continued with a sneer. "She's a little sissy who talked a big game then lost in a fight with me and is suffering the consequences of being stripped of her right to be a pirate."

Luffy giggled a bit. "Well... serves you right then, whoever you are. That's not gonna happen to me or my crew. We went off for two years to train and now that we're back, nothing's going to stop me from being King of the Pirates!" Luffy smirked.

"That's right boss." Chocolat said as she patted Luffy's back and led them along the way. "Now get back in the stroller little one. When we set sail, I'll be sure to drop you off somewhere so Captain Luffy doesn't have to deal with the fallout of our bet." She was lying in front of Luffy to save face of course.

Nami winced and bit her lip in frustration.

"Get back in the stroller now." Chocolat ordered.

"Hmph...! No w-" Nami began before Chocolat whacked the gun she had upside Nami's head. Nami's eyes crossed and she fell back, plopping into the stroller with her tongue flopped out the side of her mouth.
1552133111122111211231.title: Luffy thinks that Chocolat is the Real Nami

choices: Luffy wakes up in a diaper and stroller next to Nami
Nami wakes up and sees Luffy strung up by his Briefs.
15521331111221112112311.content:
Luffy smiled as he walked with who he thought was Nami all the way back to the tavern.

With a spring in his step, he laughed all the way there, barely managing to keep a convincing enough lid on his mouth to keep the very well-done and totally not obvious disguise from dismantling itself. Chocolat smirked as she laughed along with him and pretended to know what he was talking about when it came to all the stuff he kept bringing up from the past.

"Hmm? In here?" Luffy blinked in confusion as he entered the tavern and looked around a bit confused. He looked ahead and caught sight of what looked like Franky and ... Sniper King...?

"Franky! ... Sniper King came back?!" Luffy's mouth hung open in shock. Then his eyes wandered on over to Chocolat's boss, Demalo Black.

"...... HUH!? THERE'S TWO ME'S!" Luffy's eyes shot out of his skull in shock with his hood going back and his mustache falling off. Demalo Black looked on in surprise too, recognizing the face.

"... Wait... Is that...?" Demalo Black began before Chocolat smirked and took out her secret weapon. A crowbar made of Seastone! With a huge THWACK she swung the item into the back of Luffy's knees!

"AAGH!" Luffy yelped, feeling pain as he fell to his knees. He turned to look and caught sight of the crowbar smacking him across the face right before his eyes crossed, rolled up, and his eyes fluttered before he face planted the floor with his butt sticking straight up. Chocolat then pressed her foot onto Luffy's bum with a smile.

"I present to you, the IMPOSTER Monkey D. Luffy boss." Chocolat said with a wink.

Demalo Black understood what she meant instantly and went from a look of surprise to a look of sneering happiness, alongside 'Franky' and 'Sniper King'.

Both Luffy and Nami were drooling with half cracked open eyes gone completely white in their unconscious states.

The Fake Straw Hats were becoming ever more real.
15521331111221112112311.title: Chocolat takes Luffy to the Tavern and Ambushes...

choices: Luffy refuses to say a word about his crew.
Luffy breaks down and tells what he knows about his crew's whereabouts.
155213311112211121123111.content:
Aftter some time had passed, Luffy was finally waking up.

"Wha-what happened?" asked Luffy as he was suddenly hit by the weakening feeling that Seastone gave him. As he tried to look around, he saw what he thought was the fake Nami, the one that couldn't possibly be the real one since she was wearing a diaper.

"Well, well, well. Look who's finally decided to wake up," said a voice that startled Luffy. He then saw that it was 'Nami'.

"Nami, what's going on? I think there might be Seastone near me, I feel weak. Help me."

"Help you? Why should I help you, you impostor?"

Luffy's face turned white as he finally realized that she wasn't Nami. He then turned to the real Nami and realized she was the real Nami after all. He then turned back to Chocolat.

"Who are you? You're not Nami! Get me out of here."

"I don't think you're in a position to demand. Why don't you see your new attire first."

Luffy then looked down and saw that he was in a stroller and wearing a baby shirt that said "It's A Boy!" on it and he was wearing a diaper.

"What was that you said about this not happening to you or your crew?" mocked Chocolat as Luffy finally realized that both he and Nami were defeated.

"By the way, I embedded some extra pieces of Seastone into the stroller so you can't escape. As a real pirate, I've taken the chances of stealing Seastone objects from Marines when I can. Comes in real handy against Devil Fruit users," added Chocolat.

Chocolat then leaned down at Luffy.

"Now then, where is the rest of your crew? It's clear now that you're all alive and I'm having fun turning you and her into babies."
155213311112211121123111.title: Luffy wakes up in a diaper and stroller next to...

choices: Chocolat decides to Interrogate Nami Instead
Chocolat Tortures Luffy in front of Nami with more Public Humiliation this time
1552133111122111211231111.content:
"NO WAY!" Luffy snaps and shakes his head.

"Hmm? You sure?" Chocolat said waving her gun around, her boss standing behind her with his arms crossed and the proudest smile on his face. He knew what she was about to do.

"I'm not letting you know where my crew is!" Luffy snapped. He didn't even know but he wasn't going to let that on either. It might stall her some more.

That, of course, didn't last when the seastone crowbar smashed against Luffy's diapered front! Luffy's eyes widened and crossed with intense pain. He began sweating all over and making weird mooing sounds with his mouth. It hurt him quite a whole lot.

"I'll make these orbs of your practically useless if you keep refusing." Chocolat smirked.

Nami had an idea but figured she shouldn't but in. She gulped and winced as Luffy's mewing in pain kept coming out of him. A loud hissing was heard as he began peeing the diaper in front of them all, which got him to blush and the patrons of the bar to actually laugh. It was quite the show.
1552133111122111211231111.title: Luffy refuses to say a word about his crew.

choices: Boa Hancock (She is envious of Nami's closer bond with Luffy)
Another girl

Hancock tracks Nami down during the timeskip.

155213331.content: When does Hancock begin dominating Nami?
155213331.title: Boa Hancock (She is envious of Nami's close...

choices: Hancock finds Nami alone.
Hancock finds Nami with a couple other Straw Hats.
Other.
1552133311.content:
Ever since Hancock and Luffy travelled to Impel Down, she has hated Nami. She had once asked Luffy about his crew, to know more about him, and when he spoke about Nami, it made her blood boil. The way he described her, from her "amazing" navigational skills, to her greedy nature, and to her temper, it infuriated Hancock.

Hancock could not understand how this girl could so disrepect her Captain that she would beat him up constantly whenever she thought that Luffy had done something stupid. Hancock believed that Nami should adore and respect Luffy just as Hancock's own crew respected and adored her.

And yet, Hancock could not understand how her beloved Luffy could not only allow it, but respect her as a navigator. He clearly told he found part of her scary, so why keep her as a crewmember? That's when Hancock thought that maybe a scary woman is what Luffy found attractive in a woman. But if that was the case, then she figured that Nami was a an obstacle if she were to get closer to Luffy.

To anyone from the outside world,who knew nothing, it might seem strange that a Schichibukai would consider a regular pirate, an "ant", as any type of threat. But this was not an ant that Hancock could take lightly or else she could lose Luffy forever. Since she didn't know where Nami was during the Straw Hats' training, she waited until that fatedul day that the Straw Hat Pirates were to reunite.

After she bid Luffy goodbye after dropping him off (and giving him a disguise), Hancock also landed on Sabaody to find Nami.
1552133311.title: When the Straw Hats are at Sabaody Archipelago ...

choices: Marguerite.
Sadi-chan.
Other.

choices: She wants revenge for her and her friends being turned to stone.
She finds out that Hancock (and her sisters) used to be slaves.

155221.content: Why/when does Marguerite start to dominate Hancock?
155221.title: Marguerite.

choices: Marguerite waits until the others leave to start her plan.
Marguerite leaves Kuja Castle to plan.
Other.
1552212.content:
After Marguerite and her friends had been changed back to normal, she was told how the male intruder, Luffy, had manaed to beat Boa Sandersonia and Boa Marigold and how he protected them by covering the Gorgon's Eye on Sandersonia's back. Afterwards, he was somehow able to convince their Empress Hancock to turn them back to normal.

Maruerite felt very grateful to Luffy helping them out (even if it was just him returning the favor), so when she heard that he had been summoned to Kuja Castle, she was worried that Boa Hancock would try to take him out right then and there. Marguerite snuck into Kuja Castle and when she got to where Hancock and Luffy were, she got the shock of her life.

She looked in shock as Hancock revealed her back to Luffy and Marguerite saw that there was no Gorgon's Eye, but some strange symbol. She then learned that it was a slave symbol that the World Nobles burn into their slaves. Boa Hancock and her sisters hadn't defeated a Gorgon, they were actually slaves.

To say that Marguerite was angry was an understatement. Everything the Kujas thought they knew about the "heroic" Gorgon Sisters was all a lie. Even Elder Nyon knew the truth and helped her in the past apparently and yet the Snake Princess still treated her horribly.

Marguerite stared at Hancock with eyes of anger and betrayal and vowed to take down the mighty Empress.

Vivi

1552321.title: Nami.

choices: Nami asks Vivi to come to her room to set up her bed (but Nami has other plans).
Nami goes over to relax on deck and asks Vivi to wait on her since Vivi's a gues
Something else.
15523211.content:
The Straw Hat Pirates were currently on the Grand Line, currently on the way to an island called Little Garden. As Nami was making sure the Going Merry was on track via the Log Pose, she had a lot on her mind due to the recent guest of the Straw Hat Pirates, Princess Vivi.

'Perhaps we were a bit hasty in accepting her request to take her to Alabasta to save her kingdom and defeat Baroque Works,' thought Nami to herself. 'This organization is led by one of the Shichibukai after all and thanks to the princess's big mouth, Baroque Works knows that we know that fact. And even though I agreed to it only on the condition for 1 billion beli, but now that I think about it, if her country is on the brink of a civil war, they may not have that much money.'

Nami turned sideways and gave a small glare as Vivi was just relaxing and interacting with the crew as if she was an actual member of the crew.

'She's acting too carefree. I need to make sure the princess gives me some sort of payment before we even get there. And if she doesn't have the money on hand, then she'll need to do a different type of "payment"," thought Nami.
15523211.title: Shortly after the Straw Hats leave Whiskey Peak.

choices: Nami has Vivi get some tangerines and then feed them to Nami on Vivi's knees.
Nami has Vivi take a makeshift fan and give her a small breeze.
Something else.
155232112.content:
After checking again to make sure that the Going Merry was still on track to the next island and she didn't feel any upcoming majr weather changes, Nami walked over to the general area where the crew and Vivi were relaxing in their own ways.

"Princess, can you get me a chair so that I can enjoy this relaxing weather, too?" asked Nami, catching Vivi and the others off guard, not realizing that Nami was right there.

"I can get it for you, Nami-swannn" said a typical swooning Sanji when he wanted to do something for a beautiful girl.

"N-no, it's alright, Sanji. I'll do it," replied Vivi as she could feel that Nami was still mad at her for dragging them into a conflict with a Shichibukai just as soon as they had entered the Grand Line and Vivi wanted Nami to be her friend. "But you don't have to be formalo anything, you can call me by my name, Vivi."

'You don't tell someone something like that when they aren't your friend, fool,' thought Nami. 'Now I feel the urge to keep calling you Princess just to spite you. Although, now that I think about it, by the time we reach your home island, I can ensure that the word princess will mean the farthest thing from a dignified royal to you. Maybe you're not as big a fool as I thought, Princess, heheheh.'

Vivi then got a big, long chair for Nami to relax and stretch herself and opened it up and said, "Here you go, Nami. Anything else I can do for you?"

Nami gave a quck smirk before she sat down in the chair in a regal manner as if it were her throne and said, "Why thank you, Princess. Can you...."

info.brief_description: A One Piece character gets dominated by a female One Piece character
info.description:
A character(s) from the One Piece world gets dominated by a female One Piece character(s). The one who gets dominated can be either male or female, but the one who dominates must be female.

Rules:

1. No males dominate.
2. Give each chapter a decent size. Exceptions are the setup chapters.
3. Give decent grammar. It doesn't have to be perfect, but have it legible.
4. Try not to end a story too short. Keep the stories ongoing as long as you can.
5. Go wild on fetishes.
6. Try not to kill the one who is dominated so as to keep the story going.

If I need to add any more rules, I will. But other than that, have fun!
